title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - HPC at Scale with AWS Parallel Computing Service (PCS) (CMP340)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 并行计算服务 (PCS) 实现大规模 HPC (CMP340)
abstract: High performance computing workloads are growing in complexity, scale, and importance. AWS Parallel Computing Service (PCS) brings simplicity and flexibility to this challenge by automating cluster creation, job scheduling, and resource management. In this session, learn how PCS helps organizations move faster, scale securely, and achieve predictable performance for demanding workloads in energy, manufacturing, and research. Customers will share their experience building and running real-world HPC environments with PCS, including lessons learned and best practices. Join us to see how PCS is redefining the way high performance computing runs on AWS.
abstract_cn: 高性能计算工作负载在复杂性、规模和重要性方面不断增长。AWS Parallel Computing Service (PCS) 通过自动化集群创建、作业调度和资源管理，为这一挑战带来了简单性和灵活性。在本次会议中，了解 PCS 如何帮助组织更快地行动、安全地扩展，并为能源、制造和研究领域的高要求工作负载实现可预测的性能。客户将分享他们使用 PCS 构建和运行真实 HPC 环境的经验，包括经验教训和最佳实践。加入我们，了解 PCS 如何重新定义高性能计算在 AWS 上的运行方式。
